definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
many-headed/many-layered (authority)/devolved (as opposed to centralized)/pluralistic/(as classifier) number of animals/long term (finance)/long (investment)
one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by

sentences.english: It symbolizes good fortune, Gangnam civil called "the head of wealth."
sentences.chinese: 它象徵着吉祥，江南民間稱之爲“富貴不斷頭”。

sentences.english: For the first three days, they ate nothing.
sentences.chinese: 頭三天，他們什麼也沒喫。

sentences.english: Gas is escaping from the range.
sentences.chinese: 這瓦斯爐只有兩個瓦斯頭。

sentences.english: Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 別推下來，但使用面對身體來驅動頭向前。

sentences.english: Each family possesses at least three milk cows.
CNS infections may be associated with brain atrophy, with resultant microcephaly and ventriculomegaly.
sentences.chinese: 有關，伴有小頭畸形和腦室擴大的後果。

sentences.english: The second group stencilled the shipping marks.
sentences.chinese: 第二組用模版印製裝船嘜頭。

sentences.english: He has been the head janitor in our school for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 他在我們學校當了二十年的清潔員工頭。

sentences.english: My head was rising up, and my body was following it.
sentences.chinese: 我擡起頭，身體也隨之立起。

sentences.english: One of the heads of the beast seemed to have had a fatal wound, but the fatal wound had been healed.
sentences.chinese: 它在頭一個獸面前，施行頭一個獸所有的權柄。

sentences.english: First you borrow, then you beg.
sentences.chinese: 頭一遭借錢，下一遭就討飯。

sentences.english: Think back to the gastronomic example.
sentences.chinese: 回過頭再來想想關於美食的例子。

sentences.english: They both come complete with a matching streamlet , a pump , and fountain heads .
sentences.chinese: 他們都來完成同等額小溪，一個水泵，噴泉頭。

sentences.english: She held her head high as a small trickle of blood ran down from her bruised knee.
sentences.chinese: 她高高揚起頭，青腫的膝蓋上一滴血慢慢流下來。

sentences.english: Keep the horse's head up and still to make your farrier's work easier.
sentences.chinese: 讓馬擡着頭並且靜止能使蹄鐵匠的工作更加容易。

sentences.english: Turn up your head, look at the spider on the small corner of the ceiling in your house.
sentences.chinese: 擡起頭，看看那隻在你家天花板上小小角落的蜘蛛。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
